description: Browse our range of furniture storage solutions here including office cupboards, pedestals, filing cabinets, tambour cupboards and bookcases.  We have office storage solutions to compliment all our office desks, with modular options to create the perfect workspace and maximise space in your office.
name: Pedestals, Storage & Accessories
